task.title: Resetting the Origin
task.shortdesc: You can reset the origin when you want the to process all available data. You can reset the origin for the Directory and Kafka Consumer origins.

context.p: For Directory and Kafka Consumer, when you stop a pipeline, the notes where it stopped processing data. When you restart the pipeline, it continues from where it left off by default.
When you want the to process all available data instead of continuing from where it stopped, reset the origin.

step.cmd: To reset the origin, from the pipeline canvas, click the Settings icon.
In the Reset Origin Confirmation dialog box, click Yes to reset the origin.
